tbi1.Description: 1. Have you ever had a head injury or concussion"

tbi2.Description: 2. Did you ever get knocked out or lose consciousness as a result of a head injury"

tbi3.Description: 3. Did you ever experience any symptoms immediately after a head injury"

tbi4.Description: 4. Did you receive any kind of medical attention/treatment for a head injury"

tbifirst.Description: a. Age at first head injury in years

tbinumber.Description: c. Record the number of head injuries reported

tbirating.Description: d. Rating of most severe head injury from above

Levels.8: Head injury with LOC/coma lasting 6 hours or more
Levels.6: Mild head injury with LOC for between 2-30 minutes.... lasting !7 days to 2 months
Levels.3: Mild head injury/concussion with brief loss of consciousness
Levels.4: Mild head injury with LOC for between 2-30 minutes.... lasting 1-24 hours
Levels.2: Mild head injury/concussion with no loss of consciousness
Levels.5: Mild head injury with LOC for between 2-30 minutes.... lasting 1-7 days
Levels.7: Mild head injury with LOC for between 30 minutes-5 hours

tbirecent.Description: b. Age at most recent head injury in years
